data.quote: I love British humor. It's just so - surreal.
data.author: Beck

data.quote: When I was young, my favorite picture book was 'Fletcher and Zenobia,' written by Edward Gorey and illustrated by Victoria Chess. It's long out of print now, but its mix of macabre humor and 1960s psychedelia made it a perfect children's book for the times.
data.author: Rick Riordan

data.quote: I like guys with a sense of humor who smile a lot and are kind.
data.author: Nikki Glaser

data.quote: As far as how I approach the humor, I think the best comedy is going to happen when I'm myself and act organically to a news item or situation.
data.author: Nikki Glaser

data.quote: All my relatives and friends have been pretty aware of my brand of humor for a while, so none of them have been shocked.
data.author: Nikki Glaser

data.quote: Humor can bring people under the tent. And a good joke can deflect some of the intensity surrounding a serious subject.
data.author: Ted Danson

data.quote: I've always had a sick sense of humor, and I've always wanted that to permeate the music because I don't take myself seriously. I take the music seriously, but I know I'm not God's gift to anyone except my mom.
data.author: Josh Homme

data.quote: I don't have a caustic sense of humor. What I find funny, that humor comes from a much gentler place.
data.author: Vera Farmiga

data.quote: I think God gave us senses of humor, and we should use them.
data.author: Vera Farmiga

data.quote: I'm drawn to the unconventional because I've been drawn unconventionally. I believe that I'm supposed to topple over these false images of what's idealistically beautiful. Because, of course, these intangible qualities are very attractive to women. Sincerity. Sense of humor. Success.
data.author: CeeLo Green

data.quote: I think being a parent is knowing how to love. Sometimes love is discipline, sometimes it's humor, sometimes it's listening.
data.author: Melissa Etheridge

data.quote: You see, that's another thing that my parents gave me: an enormously great sense of humor.
data.author: Liza Minnelli

data.quote: I just am a snob when it comes to humor.
data.author: Courteney Cox

data.quote: Humor is a wonderful way to deal with our suffering because if we can laugh at our troubles, we can feel better. Thich Nhat Hanh is a special man who has helped millions with their suffering with incredible technique. But he doesn't know real suffering, because he has not dated as much as I have.
data.author: Garry Shandling

data.quote: I have this horrible sense of humor where I think discomfort is funny - partly because I experience discomfort a lot, and it's a way of laughing at it and getting a release.
data.author: Joaquin Phoenix

data.quote: Some people say my humor focuses too much on stereotypes. It doesn't. It focuses on facts.
data.author: Sarah Silverman

data.quote: The darker the film, the more vital everyone's sense of humor is on set.
data.author: Eric Bana
